                                  City Council

                                  The Everman City Council meets regularly on the second and fourth Tuesday of every month at 6:00 pm. Meetings are held at the Everman Civic Center - 213 N Race St. Everman, Texas 76140, unless otherwise noted on a posted agenda.

                                  Ray Richardson
                                  Mayor
                                  817-293-0525; ext 307 Email
